content.prompt: Based on the information provided in Figure 1 and Figure 2, which of the following best explains the effects of a mutation in the promoter of the TYR gene that prevents it from being transcribed?

choices.label: DNA damage due to UV radiation will be strongly inhibited, resulting in a positive selection pressure.
DNA damage due to UV radiation will be strongly inhibited, resulting in a negative selection pressure.
Skin pigmentation will not be able to change, resulting in a positive selection pressure.
Skin pigmentation will not be able to change, resulting in a negative selection pressure.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain how biological models relate to larger principles, concepts, processes, systems, or theories.
